game.name: Milky Quest II
game.shortDescription: You find yourself in a world full of cute monster girls! The only problem is you lost your memories and all the monster girls want to eat you for nourishment! How will you survive!?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You find yourself in a world full of cute monster girls! The only problem is you lost your memories and all the monster girls want to eat you for nourishment! How will you survive!?

reviewHighlights.text: The animation... its really insane for its price. but the gameplay mechanic can get to be really grindy (you can use the cheat that is available to ge...
